original_title: You Can Walk Down from There
overview: A leisurely observation of the fading: a nursing home, their feet soaking in water, and a broken clockwork. Scars are cracks in the ice, the veins resemble tree branches. Over time, people change: there are wrinkles and an urgent need to talk to someone, to tell someone at least about the trip to the moon.
title: You Can Walk Down from There
